thought: The hyperlinks extracted appear to be internal links to different categories of products offered on the site and social sharing links. There are no external links that appear to be suspicious or indicative of phishing attempts, but this does not necessarily validate the legitimacy of the site. There is also a discrepancy in the copyright year "Copyright © 2024," which seems to be an error as the current year is 2023. This could be a sign of lack of attention to detail or an attempt to appear more established than it is. I now have enough information to make an informed decision about the legitimacy of this website. I now know the final answer Based on the information gathered, the URL appears to be a potential scam website.

observation.reason: The website displays unusually low prices which could indicate too-good-to-be-true deals a common tactic used by scam websites. Additionally the domain was recently registered which can be a red flag when combined with other suspicious traits. The registrant's location is in Malaysia which does not match the purported Canadian connection of the website. There is no customer feedback or discussion of the website on Reddit. The SSL certificate is basic and from cPanel Inc. which is not necessarily indicative of a scam but worth noting. Lastly there is a discrepancy in the copyright year which could indicate a lack of professionalism or an attempt to mislead. All these factors combined suggest that the website might be a scam.
